name: Describes Temporal Modes
description: Describes the fundamental modes of temporal evolution through the eigenstructures of the time operator.
subject: urn:uor:resource:time-operator-formalism
contextualDescription: The Time Operator Formalism describes how temporal evolution manifests through distinct eigenstructures of the time operator, including steady states, decay modes, growth modes, and oscillatory modes, providing a mathematical foundation for understanding different types of temporal behavior.
